# Create a cmake file to build main.cpp
# This file is generated by CMake, do not edit

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0)

project(etests)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON)
set(CMAKE_CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)

include(FetchContent)

include(CTest)
enable_testing()

set(SOURCES
    system_tests.cpp
)
FetchContent_Declare(GTEST
    GIT_REPOSITORY https://github.com/google/googletest
    GIT_TAG v1.13.x)
FetchContent_MakeAvailable(GTEST)

add_executable(etests ${SOURCES})

target_link_libraries(etests GTest::gtest_main eecsge-audio eecsge-core eecsge-physics)

add_test(UnitTests etests)
